commands: clippy - Generates a standard clippy image - clippy <msg...>
clippyoption - Generates a clippy image with options [Yes] or [No]. - clippyoption <msg...>
clippyok - Generates a clippy image with an `OK` button. - clippyoption <msg...>
settz - Set (or update) a timezone for others to reference. - settz <timezone...>
time - Get someones current time (If they have a timezone set). - time <user...>
removetz - Remove your timezone if one is currently set. - removetz
remind - Create a reminder. - remind <time> <reminder msg...>
wikipedia - Get a wikipedia article based on your search entry. - wikipedia <search entry...>
setsb - Mark a channel as a starboard channel. - setsb <channel id>
getsb - Get the servers current starboard. - getsb
setthreshold - Set the amount of stars for a message to be displayed to the starboard. - setthreshold <number>
getthreshold - Get the amount of stars a message needs for it to be displayed onto the starboard. - getthreshold
